snippet.description: Third International Conference on Soft Computing for Problem Solving \- SocProS 2013 SocProS 13 26 - 28 Dec 2013 \- Roorkee, India / Pant, Millie (ed.); Deep, Kusum (ed.); Nagar, Atulya (ed.); Bansal, Jagdish (ed.) The present book is based on the research papers presented in the 3rd International Conference on Soft Computing for Problem Solving (SocProS 2013), held as a part of the golden jubilee celebrations of the Saharanpur Campus of IIT Roorkee, at the Noida Campus of Indian Institute of Technology Roorkee, India. This book is divided into two volumes and covers a variety of topics including mathematical modelling, image processing, optimization, swarm intelligence, evolutionary algorithms, fuzzy logic, neural networks, forecasting, medical and health care, data mining etc. [...] New Delhi : Springer, 2014 e-proceedings (v.1) e-proceedings (v.2)

snippet.title: Embedding librarianship in learning management systems : a how-to-do-it manual for librarians
snippet.description: Embedding librarianship in learning management systems : a how-to-do-it manual for librarians / Tumbleson, Beth E Information literacy instruction is best when it is integrated into actual research, and in higher education that means embedding librarianship into the learning management system (LMS) [...] Chicago, IL : American Library Association, 2014. - 185 p.

snippet.title: Deformations of surface singularities
snippet.description: Deformations of surface singularities / Némethi, András (ed.) ; Szilárd, ágnes (ed.) The present publication contains a special collection of research and review articles on deformations of surface singularities, that put together serve as an introductory survey of results and methods of the theory, as well as open problems, important examples and connections to other areas of mathe [...] Berlin : Springer, 2013. (Bolyai Society Mathematical Studies ; 23)

snippet.description: Search for gamma-ray-emitting active galactic nuclei in the Fermi-LAT unassociated sample using machine learning / Doert, M ; Errando, M The second Fermi-LAT source catalog (2FGL) is the deepest all-sky survey available in the gamma-ray band. snippet.title: AGN Absorption Linked to Host Galaxies
snippet.description: AGN Absorption Linked to Host Galaxies / Juneau, Stéphanie Multiwavelength identification of AGN is crucial not only to obtain a more complete census, but also to learn about the physical state of the nuclear activity (obscuration, efficiency, etc.). [...] arXiv:1312.4563. \- 2013\. - 3 p. Preprint

Computational Intelligence, Cyber Security and Computational Models \- ICC3 2013 19–21 Dec 2013 \- Coimbatore, India / Krishnan, G (ed.); Anitha, R (ed.); Lekshmi, R (ed.); Kumar, M (ed.); Bonato, Anthony (ed.); Graña, Manuel (ed.) This book contains cutting-edge research material presented by researchers, engineers, developers, and practitioners from academia and industry at the International Conference on Computational Intelligence, Cyber Security and Computational Models (ICC3) organized by PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore, India during December 19–21, 2013. The materials in the book include theory and applications for design, analysis, and modeling of computational intelligence and security. [...] New Delhi : Springer, 2014 e-proceedings

snippet.description: Towards an intelligent learning management system under blended learning : trends, profiles and modeling perspectives / Dias, Sofia B This book offers useful information that evokes initiatives towards rethinking of the value, efficiency, inclusiveness, effectiveness and personalization of the intelligent learning management systems-based blended-learning environment.. Dordrecht : Springer, 2013. - 243 p. (Intelligent Systems Reference Library ; 59)

snippet.description: Real-life marketing and promotion strategies in college libraries : connecting with campus and community / Petruzzelli, Barbara W Practical advice on how to promote your library and how to better understand and serve library usersReal-Life Marketing and Promotion Strategies in College Libraries is a ?how-to? guide to marketing and promotional activities that will raise your library's visibility in the face of increased competition from other information providers [...] Hoboken, NJ : Taylor and Francis, 2012. - 205 p.
